programme.desc: In the aftermath of a bank heist gone wrong, Mac is taken hostage. He wakes up in a submerged car with no memory of how he got there.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: An urgent search for the cause of a series of deaths by radiation poisoning may ultimately lead to a very deadly volume in the New York City Library.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: On Mac's flight to D.C., an air marshal is found murdered shortly after take-off. Mac is certain the killer is on board and searches for the murder weapon.

programme.title: CSI: NY

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Northern Kentucky businessman is shot to death at his home in front of his wife. Police launch a massive manhunt to find the culprit, but their efforts were futile. A baseball bat and forensic investigation break the case wide open.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A fifteen-year-old boy dies from a gunshot wound to his head while sitting in the lobby of his father’s gun club. Later, forensic animation shows that the bullet followed a tragic course after a misfire at the outdoor range.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The mother of a suspiciously murdered four-month-old was convicted, but an explanation for the death would come five months later from the most unlikely of sources: his newborn brother.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two of America’s premier pornographers happen to be brothers. When one turns up dead, his brother confesses to shooting him. The question for investigators is whether the shooting was pre-meditated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tracy Jo Shine grew up in a middle-class home in Houston, Texas. Unfortunately, when she attended a prestigious high school she began experimenting with drugs. When she went missing, her family suspected her new friends from school.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Hunters stumble upon a scene that includes a skull and small bones, bits of clothing, a woman's shoe, and a strand of hair. Police determine a woman was stabbed to death, and reconstruct an image of her face to find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young man dies in a mysterious car crash, but was it an accident? Forensic science uncovered what really caused the crash, and the truth devastated three different families.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three college students are killed walking along a footpath over the course of six years. Police know they're dealing with a serial killer, but the hard part is catching him.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teenager returns home after a night out with friends, and discovers his father's body lying in a pool of blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Texas woman claims that an intruder attacked her and killed two of her sons, but detectives question her story when they find some inconsistencies at the crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Fire sweeps through a mansion, killing two children, all evidence leads to the mother.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police investigate when a severed leg is found in the garbage. When they realize they can't use conventional techniques to catch the killer, police must use scientific techniques like DNA testing and toxicology reports to find him.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In St. Michaels, Maryland, a real body turns up after a murder mystery dinner and in Adelaide, South Australia, a love rival winds up dead.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Merrillville, Indiana, there are deadly secrets between family members. Near Manchester, England a late-night flower delivery proves a test run for murder.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Kansas City, Missouri, a married woman falls for a street hustler and pays a devastating price. In Castlerock, Northern Ireland, a married dentist falls for a patient and comes up with an unusual treatment plan to secure a fresh start.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Boone County, Iowa, a man on a farm believes that he's shot himself but can't figure out how. In Pryor, Oklahoma, an affair turns deadly resulting in a house fire.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A pregnant wife is killed execution style and an EMT is intent on taking a life.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: A Kentucky airline pilot is murdered for money and in the UK, a former golf pro is attacked by his wife's young lover.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Washington State, a husband goes missing and in the UK, there are killer swingers.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs

programme.desc: Langston and Nick are called in to investigate a murder at a fast food restaurant and have quite a task ahead of them when they discover that much of the evidence is coated in cooking oil.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: While Langston testifies in the trial of a respected congressman, new evidence sends the CSIs back to the lab to reopen the investigation.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: The CSIs are called to three different crime scenes in one night. The crimes are seemingly unrelated but each case's forensic evidence reveals a common link.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.desc: When two office mates plot to rob a casino, their plan ends up with the CSIs investigating a murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The news of a flight attendant's brutal murder prompts a man to contact police with details of another similar case. After considering the evidence, police determine they are dealing with a serial killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a married couple decided to escape the cold of winter with a vacation in Key West, the wife went missing and police searched the island without finding any evidence. Then two important pieces of video surfaced.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Bomb attacks typically pose a difficult problem for investigators to solve due to the absence of the attacker and a damaged crime scene, but forensic scientists manage to uncover miniscule pieces of plastic that lead straight to the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled the death an accident, but the detectives investigating the case thought the evidence at the scene indicated otherwise. It would take three years, an exhumation and a second autopsy to determine who was right.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman comes down with flu-like symptoms and eventually dies, a neurologist suspects she was poisoned with radioactive thallium. The FBI suspects her neighbour, who had a very extensive background in chemistry.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a quiet village in Great Britain, a farmer came upon a chilling sight. Impaled on his fence post was a severed lamb’s head along with a note which read, 'You next.'
